Feature.Name: Dwarf
Feature.Text: The item is durable and has Dwarven runes worked into its design. It might be associated with a clan that would like to see it returned to their ancestral halls.

MagicProperty.Name: Creator - Dwarf
MagicProperty.Description: The item is durable and has Dwarven runes worked into its design. It might be associated with a clan that would like to see it returned to their ancestral halls.
